effect_entries.effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit ratio by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
弱点が　みえる　レンズ。
持たせた　ポケモンの　技が
急所に　当たりやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a lens for scoping out weak points.
It boosts the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Lente che aumenta la probabilità di sferrare
brutti colpi.

Actúa como combustible y potencia los
movimientos de tipo Fuego. Debe llevarlo
un Pokémon.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Es erhöht die
Volltrefferquote.

Objet à tenir. Une lentille qui augmente le taux
de critiques du porteur.

약점이 보이는 렌즈.
지니게 한 포켓몬의 기술이
급소에 맞기 쉬워진다.

じゃくてんが　みえる　レンズ。
もたせた　ポケモンの　わざが
きゅうしょに　あたりやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a lens that boosts the holder’s
critical-hit ratio.

It is a lens that boosts the holder’s
critical-hit ratio.

taux de critiques du porteur.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A lens that boosts the critical-hit
ratio of the holding POKéMON.

A hold item that
improves the
critical-hit rate.

A hold item that
raises the critical-
hit rate.
